T02D3410:74a-1: kharsa p'a ni s'a dha nam /
T02D3410:74a-4: kharsa p'a ni la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3410:74a-5: mngon 'dod 'bras ster 'od gsal dpal gyi dpag bsam shing //
T02D3410:74a-6: bde gshegs tshul gyi lam chen 'jug nas ded dpon mdzad //
T02D3410:74a-7: srid zhi'i ngos mnyam dngos po kun gyi ngo bo nyid //
T02D3410:74a-8: de 'dir chu skyes phyag gis 'gro rnams sdig pa zhi mdzad do //
T02D3410:74a-9: snga bar kha sogs dag byas nas //
T02D3410:74a-10: 'jam zhing yangs pa'i stan la 'dug / bdag nyid dben par cho ga 'dis //
T02D3410:74a-11: snying gar zla ba'i sa bon 'od //
T02D3410:74a-12: rang gi snying gar bsgom par bya //
T02D3410:74a-14: de yi 'od zer rtse mos bskul //
T02D3410:74a-15: yang dag gdan drangs mkha' la 'phags //
T02D3410:74a-16: dpal mgon kharsa p'a ni dang //
T02D3410:74a-17: bla ma sangs rgyas de sras tshogs //
T02D3410:74a-18: mchod sprin sa bon las byung ba'i //
T02D3410:74a-19: sna tshogs rnams kyis mchod par bya //
T02D3410:74a-20: de nas mngon par phyag 'tshal zhing ;
T02D3410:74a-21: / sdig pa bshags pa la sogs bya //
T02D3410:74a-22: gang zhig shin tu thog ma med pa nas /
T02D3410:74a-23: 'khor bar 'khor ba'i tshe bdag gis mi dge ba bgyis pa dang /
T02D3410:74a-25: bgyis pa la rjes su yi rang ba de thams
T02D3410:74a-26: cad bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du bdag gis bshags
T02D3410:74a-27: par bgyi'o// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang sras dang 'phags //
T02D3410:74a-28: gzhan yang gang zhig dge mdzad pa //
T02D3410:74a-29: de la nges par rjes yi rang //
T02D3410:74a-30: yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsngo //
T02D3410:74a-31: snying rje'i rang bzhin mchog gyur pa'i //
T02D3410:74a-32: sangs rgyas la ni skyabs su mchi //
T02D3410:74a-33: chos kun rgyun mi 'chad par ni //
T02D3410:74a-34: gcig tu dga' gzugs chos dang ni //
T02D3410:74a-35: rab dga' la sogs sa la bzhugs //
T02D3410:74a-36: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de bzhin //
T02D3410:74a-37: mya ngan 'da' bar bzhed rnams la //
T02D3410:74a-38: sangs rgyas gzhan la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D3410:74a-39: yun ring rnams su bzhugs par yang //
T02D3410:74a-40: bdag gis gsol ba gdab par bgyi //
T02D3410:74a-41: sgrib pa thams cad rtsad nas zad byed pa'i //
T02D3410:74a-42: rgyur gyur byang chub sems ni bdag gis bskyed //
T02D3410:74a-43: bde gshegs sras dang bcas pa'i lam la yang //
T02D3410:74a-44: rnam dag bsam pas yang dag bsten par bgyi //
T02D3410:74a-45: g-yo dang mi g-yo'i 'gro 'di ma lus rnams //
T02D3410:74a-46: gcig dang du bral stong pa nyid ces bsam /
T02D3410:74b-0: @74b aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a
T02D3410:74b-1: wa a'atma ko& ham zhes pas stong pa nyid du
T02D3410:74b-3: byin rlabs rang bzhin rnam par dag pa 'dis //
T02D3410:74b-4: chos kun de bzhin bdag med blta bar bya //
T02D3410:74b-5: aom sva bh'a wa shuddha:sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a wa shuddho& ham zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D3410:74b-6: de nas bdag nyid rnam par shes pa tsam du bsgoms nas /
T02D3410:74b-7: sngon gyi smon lam gyis bskul nas pam yig yongs
T02D3410:74b-8: su gyur pa las sna tshogs chu skyes la aam
T02D3410:74b-9: yig las skyes pa'i zla ba gang ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D3410:74b-10: dri ma med pa de'i steng du hr'i:yig shin tu
T02D3410:74b-11: 'od gsal zhing 'od zer gyi tshogs 'phro bas nam
T02D3410:74b-12: mkha'i khams khyab pa rnam par bsgom par bya'o ;
T02D3410:74b-13: / de yongs su gyur pa las rang gi sa bon ze'u 'bru dang /
T02D3410:74b-14: sdong bus brgyan pa'i chu skyes kha 'bus pa blta bar bya'o //
T02D3410:74b-15: 'dir de rnams thams cad yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das su bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3410:74b-16: bsil zer bye ba'i 'od kyis dkar ba'i sku'i dbu la ral pa'i cod pan dang /
T02D3410:74b-17: 'od dpag tu med pas brgyan pa /
T02D3410:74b-18: sna tshogs padma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa /
T02D3410:74b-19: sku la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3410:74b-20: zhal 'dzum zhing lo brgyad gnyis lon pa lta bu phyag g-yas pa mchog sbyin /
T02D3410:74b-21: phyag g-yon na sdong bu dang bcas pa'i chu skyes bsnams pa /
T02D3410:74b-22: phyag nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab pa la sred pa
T02D3410:74b-23: can rnams pre ta 'og nas steng du kha gdangs
T02D3410:74b-24: shing / lto ba che zhing shin tu rid pa
T02D3410:74b-25: kha dog gnag pa khab kyi kha can rnams tshim
T02D3410:74b-26: par mdzad pa dpal ldan gru 'dzin gyi ri la
T02D3410:74b-27: shing / bzhugs pa / snying rje'i snum mdangs dang ldan zhing sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa /
T02D3410:74b-28: shin tu zhi ba rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan pa /
T02D3410:74b-30: g-yas phyogs logs na nor bzangs gzhon nu'o //
T02D3410:74b-31: de la sgrol ma ljang gu /
T02D3410:74b-32: phyag g-yon pa na sdong bu dang bcas pa'i autpa la bsnams pa /
T02D3410:74b-33: phyag g-yas pa mchog sbyin brkyang pa /
T02D3410:74b-34: sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D3410:74b-35: lang tsho dar la nu ma rgyas pa'o //
T02D3410:74b-36: nor bzangs gzhon nu thal mo sbyar zhing gser mdog ltar gsal ba /
T02D3410:74b-38: phyag g-yon na po ti dang bcas shing rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa'o //
T02D3410:75a-0: @75a * // rgyab na khro gnyer can no //
T02D3410:75a-2: de la khro gnyer can phyag bzhi pa gser mdog lta bu /
T02D3410:75a-3: ral pa'i tshogs dang ldan pa /
T02D3410:75a-4: phyag g-yon na dbyu gu rtse gsum dang spyi blugs bsnams pa /
T02D3410:75a-5: phyag g-yas phyag 'tshal ba'i tshul dang /
T02D3410:75a-8: rta mgrin ni sku mdog dmar po thung zhing lto ba 'phyang ba /
T02D3410:75a-9: skra dmar ser gyen du 'bar ba /
T02D3410:75a-10: sprul gyi se ral khar byas pa /
T02D3410:75a-11: sma ra ser pos zhal gyi dkyil 'khor brgyan pa /
T02D3410:75a-12: spyan gsum dmar zhing zlum pa /
T02D3410:75a-13: smin mtshams su khro gnyer bsdus pa /
T02D3410:75a-14: stag gi pags pa'i na bza' can /
T02D3410:75a-15: dbyug pa'i mtshan ma dang ldan zhing phyag g-yas pa phyag 'tshal ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'o //
T02D3410:75a-16: de rnams thams cad rang gi gtso bo'i zhal nas
T02D3410:75a-17: bskul zhing blta ba ji ltar mdzes pa bzhugs par
T02D3410:75a-18: bsgom par bya'o // de nas rang gi snying ga'i
T02D3410:75a-19: sa bon las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du
T02D3410:75a-20: hr'i:yig rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3410:75a-21: de bas 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'phros te /
T02D3410:75a-22: khams gsum khengs nas sems can thams cad 'jig rten
T02D3410:75a-23: dbang phyug gi go 'phang la bkod nas slar yang
T02D3410:75a-24: de bzhin du 'od zer sa bon gyi yi ge
T02D3410:75a-26: yang de'i 'od kyis ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la /
T02D3410:75a-27: dam tshig sems dpa' dang lhan cig tu 'o ma
T02D3410:75a-28: dang chu 'dres pa bzhin du gzugs gcig tu bsgom
T02D3410:75a-29: par bya'o // de nas lus ngag yid gsum rnam
T02D3410:75a-30: par dag pa'i phyir rim pa ji lta ba bzhin
T02D3410:75a-31: du spyi bor aom yig dkar po //
T02D3410:75a-32: mgrin par a'a: yig dmar po //
T02D3410:75a-33: snying gar h'um yig nag po bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3410:75a-34: 'dir yang rgyun mi 'chad par 'od zer gyi dra ba mtha' yas pa byung ste /
T02D3410:75a-35: sems can gyi phung po ma lus pa'i sdig pa
T02D3410:75a-36: yang dag par 'joms pa bsgom par bya zhing ji
T02D3410:75a-37: ltar nus par spro bar bya'o //
T02D3410:75a-38: mkhas shing 'dzin pa'i shes rab dang //
T02D3410:75a-39: skal bzang nad med phun sum tshogs //
T02D3410:75a-40: sgom pa'i sbyor bas thob 'gyur te //
T02D3410:75a-41: brtson 'grus ldan pas mngon sum byed //
T02D3410:75a-42: bsgoms pas ngal na sems rtse gcig pas sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3410:75b-0: 'di'i kha dog ston @75b ka'i skar ma'i phreng ba dri med ltar //
T02D3410:75b-1: rab tu 'od gsal dpag tu med pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba can //
T02D3410:75b-2: bzlas pas skyo bar gyur na bsod nams yongs su bsngos nas ldang //
T02D3410:75b-3: lha yi nga rgyal dang bcas ci bde bar ni gnas par bya //
T02D3410:75b-4: dpal ldan 'jig rten dbang phyug gi //
T02D3410:75b-5: sgrub thabs cho ga 'di byas pa'i //
T02D3410:75b-6: bdag gis bsod nams gang bsags des //
T02D3410:75b-7: 'gro rnams de yi gnas thob shog / po ta la'i kharsa p'a ni'i sgrub thabs /
